message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate down to that amount?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. However, I believe this product is worth more than that. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, my budget is still limited to $10,000. I'm sorry if my previous offers didn't reflect that clearly. Would it be possible for us to agree on $10,000?
